topic.title: what is the strategy of backup amdin's account when I reinstall zeronet?
topic.body:
Well,this is my situaton,1,I delete my whole directory of zeronet ,ie. uninstall zeronet.2,I reinstall zeronet and paste my  site URL in browser to download the site's whole content from other nodes.Question is ,how can I backup the core data such as .json or key rings, so that I can regain control of my site?

Last time I did these step, the message "wrong private key and failed to publish" popped up ,I only backuped and restored user.json. Aren't these enough for regaining the control of my site?

topic.title: how to display zerotalk in pager style instead of "show more topic"
topic.body: Like it will appears when you search xxx in google site,on the bottom of the result page ,you can see it shows pager 1,2,3,4...10.

topic.body:

> [gitcenter](#comment_1323_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): Was ZeroTalk the site you cloned? If it was, the button shouldn't have disappeared unless you've manually edited HTML or something. Can you send me the link to the site or something so I could help you?

> [sdfsdgasdew](#comment_2_1CpcxT1xWtqTRZTRR1KnH8gGsY2i4rJ7du): wait   should I add your tox ID ? We talk in tox OK?me :04EEAE5A5555B85F09D28853B384F7ECBA76FD7ED7C65E90269CA61799E6D120AF581DB436A8 [...]

We talk in qtox OK? Or here?

> [gitcenter](#comment_1324_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): I don't have Tox unfortunately, I'd prefer talking here.

OK , talk here, can you tell me which file is it to edite to insert a button in any section of the board?

> [gitcenter](#comment_1325_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): I see [...]

you are the man.   It works.But the question comes there: how to prevent people from to start a new thread in my index?
You see that anyone can start a thread in index,that is bad...

> [gitcenter](#comment_1327_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): This would require modifications in ZeroTalk core because this is not supported by default. I won't give you all the code but I'll explain the idea. loadTopics function contains the following: [...]

which file has loadTopics function？

> [gitcenter](#comment_1327_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): As for the "New Topic" button, you could add the display: none / display: inline check here as well.
What file did I need to modify? all.js has topic_creator_user.value , but where do I need to place display: none?

> [gitcenter](#comment_1331_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): You can edit CSS styles from JavaScript, e.g. with document.querySelector("...").style.display = "none" / "".

Man I am confused...You clone my site and tell me where do I need to modify, OK? css has nothing with document.querySelector("

1584763992_1CpcxT1xWtqTRZTRR1KnH8gGsY2i4.body: Is the zerotalk programm decrypt the picture of topic-chat.png?

> [gitcenter](#comment_1333_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): Images are cached. Clean the cache of your browsers or keep DevTools open while developing (you have to tick "Disable cache" in DevTools settings though)

F12 --setting ---tick the Devt , and didn't work .Wierd,though the site's  .ico did. .

> [gitcenter](#comment_1336_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): Did you refresh after ticking the checkbox? Perhaps you're modifying wrong file or something like that.

Yes , I modified the right file, you could clone my site and see the files. The content.json record the right sha512 hashgets of the new *.png files.

> [gitcenter](#comment_1340_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): Wait... does this mean one icon is embedded and another one isn't?

yes.

> [geekless](#comment_185_1GooUE19488nDwG3TdkM8seYAHct4gjkq4): The only non-embedded icon seem to be img/loading.gif. [...]

It works  thanks man .
By the way , do you have tox? let us make a friend

1596981403_1CpcxT1xWtqTRZTRR1KnH8gGsY2i4.body:
> [marcusfinch](#comment_4_1JKZJh2XYF8C6q5p7T7FmiL3JDux2CxWyJ): It has it's own "DNS"  

Tell me more detail about it , for example, when I press enter in the browser with the address "http://127.0.0.1:43110/00.00.bit" ,the zeronet client will call Namecoin's server to inquire into the database hold by namecoin.The namecoin server will give string  "15DoUzapXLvwTxmjgSePYKiDWnsev7L4KK" to Zeronet client?
Is it the whole process？
00.00.bit	15DoUzapXLvwTxmjgSePYKiDWnsev7L4KK	• Namecoin

> [marcusfinch](#comment_5_1JKZJh2XYF8C6q5p7T7FmiL3JDux2CxWyJ): No it doesn't call the namecoin server.  When you get a .bit domain from namecoin, it registers you in the blockchain.  I believe that what ZeroNet does is keep a current copy of the namecoin blockchain and uses that for lookups. [...]
Still do not get it . Blockchain isn't located in zeronet official server?
